S

Scratch - Class in persistence.model
dom-object representing a scratch this object can be mapped to the database as json-entry fields: fileName - name of the scratch file startFrame - number of frames read from the playerThread after this scratch should be added
Scratch() - Constructor for class persistence.model.Scratch
 
Scratch(String, int) - Constructor for class persistence.model.Scratch
 
selectNoiseProfile(String) - Method in class gui.NoiseEditorController
method to select a new noiseprofile, e.g. invoked by the MusicLibraryController tableview of scratches is filled and if active the constant noise is selected
service - package service
 
service.playback - package service.playback
 
service.util - package service.util
 
ServiceProvider - Class in service
class which provides all service classes and util classes needed over static getter methods every class provided is only instantiated once
ServiceProvider() - Constructor for class service.ServiceProvider
 
setAmplifier(int) - Method in class persistence.model.NoiseProfile
 
setAmplifier(int) - Method in class persistence.PersistenceManager
sets the amplifier filed of the active NoiseProfile and persists it
setAmplifier(int) - Method in class service.playback.NoiseProvider
 
setConstantNoise(String) - Method in class persistence.model.NoiseProfile
 
setConstantNoise(String) - Method in class persistence.PersistenceManager
sets the constantNoise filed of the active NoiseProfile and persists it

setLengthOfFile(String, int) - Method in class persistence.PersistenceManager
searches the NoiseProfile by the given profile-id and sets its length

setStartFrame(int) - Method in class persistence.model.Scratch
 
setTimesPlayed(int) - Method in class persistence.model.NoiseProfile
 
SettingsWindowController - Class in gui
FXML controller for the settings window here player settings can be changed the settings available are the paths to the musiclibrary and the database and the degree of wear (parameter which specifies how often noises are added to the profile) the degree of wear can be set to three predefined profiles or a custom profile with the custom setting, the user can set the parameters pNewScratch(val between 0-1), pNewConstantNoise(val between 0-1), incAmpAfterTimesPlayed(val between 0-100) by himself all settings change are saved in the preference via the preferenceManager
SettingsWindowController() - Constructor for class gui.SettingsWindowController
 
setUp(String) - Method in class service.playback.AudioPlayer
sets up the streams needed to playback audio: A decoded AudioInputStream to read the information from the audio file and a SourceDataLine for writing data to the output-device Also creates a new NoiseProvider which loads all noise samples Creates a new PlayerThread with the streams, and NoiseProvider created
setVolume(double) - Method in class service.playback.AudioPlayer
changes the volume settings
showSettingsWindow() - Method in class gui.MainContainerController
shows the settings-window if the button was clicked loads the settingsWindow.fxml and shows it when returning the musicLibraryController is re-initialized, just in case the libraryRoot has been changed
simulateAttrition(String) - Method in class persistence.PersistenceManager
simulates the attrition of the currently loaded NoiseProfile randomly adds new scratches and constantNoise after a number of times played (or more exact number of attrition-simulations) defined in the config the amplifier for the noises is increased
start(Stage) - Method in class application.Main
loads the application-windows checks if librarypath and dbpath have been set yet, if not respective directory-choosers are opened first
startStopPlayback() - Method in class gui.PlayerController
called on start/stop-button-action stops the playback and the rotation if running restarts the playback and the rotation if not running
stop() - Method in class service.playback.AudioPlayer
stops the player
stopPlayback() - Method in class service.playback.PlayerThread
